notes: {"major":["In-app updates will now appear ~1-3 days after release to allow for initial bug fixes.","Users can opt-in to receive pre-releases (from the IMM Updater menu) to get updates as soon as they're available & provide feedback."],"minor":["Allow users to access browser devtools to aid bug reporting.","Pressing Esc x3 on startup will backup and reset configs.","Add a button to go back to game selection screen if stuck on loading screen.","Add links to IMM Discord server as well as Gamebanana for bug reports and feature requests.","Minor UI improvements."],"patch":["Fixed app blacking out when multiple mods had the same name.","Fixed stuck on loading bug if mod source directory was empty.","Fixed category related issues for 分类相关的问题。"],"notice":{"heading":"测试","subheading":"你怎么能看到这个？","ignoreable":2,"timer":10,"ver":"2.1.1","id":0}},"ru":{"major":["Встроенные обновления теперь появляются через ~1–3 дня после релиза, чтобы
